channel.title: Looking for a 508+ pk server with random drops
channel.description:
Ok so im looking for a RSPS with randomized drops. So no pick up item. Server that im looking for look like this one : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FSZs3sNayEs
And when u pk u dont lose ur stuff, opponent gets a random drops.
so if any1 know that kind of server post a link i really need 1.
